{"step_by_step_thinking": "BCG, or Bacillus Calmette-Guérin, is a vaccine for tuberculosis. The vaccine is more effective in preventing severe forms of TB in children, such as TB meningitis and miliary TB. These forms of TB are classified as CNS and disseminated TB. Therefore, BCG is maximally protective against CNS and disseminated TB.", "answer_choice": "C"}
